casebody.data:
BROOKS
v.
CAPSTAR CORPORATION. No. 110A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2005. John Morris, Michelle Sain Langdon, Roberta S. Sperry, Charlotte, for Capstar Corp., et al. Vernon Sumwalt, Bob Bollinger, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Patricia Brooks) shall have up to and including the 25th day of August 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2005."
